descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
🏛️**Do You Have What It Takes to Outsmart a God?**

Enter a one of a kind **Puzzle Box Experience** that will test your logic and your will. Told through the eyes of an imprisoned deity, Tammuz: Blood & Sand is a genre-defining XR adventure.
Whether you prefer room-scale, stationary, MR, or seated, Tammuz is optimized for EVERY play-style.
[media]

🏺 **The Prison is Ancient. The Guardian is Eternal.**

Your living room becomes the stage for a clash of ancient powers. You will navigate a maze of mind-bending puzzles to unlock the secrets of a fallen goddess.

🔮 **Shape Your Destiny**

Every lock you pick, and every riddle you solve, brings you closer to the truth. Will you liberate an ancient force, or will the echoes of the past consume you?

🗝️ **Key Features:**

🧩 **Innovative Puzzles!** Experience more than 20 unique trials that leverage the capabilities of Virtual Reality to bring you a grounded experience in a fun and magical way. With 5 extra unlockable game modes.
[media]

🌀**Seamless Mixed Reality experience!** Ground-breaking Mixed Reality technology blends the magical world of Tammuz with your physical environment.

[media]

🖐️**Tactile experience!** Solve puzzles that obey the laws of physics. Manipulate intricate mechanisms that feel as real as the objects on your desk.

[media]

📜**Ancient prison. Divine guardian. Your choice shapes destiny.** Engage with a fully voiced, interactive story where your actions determine the fate of the **Gods.**

[media]


👉 Join our Discord, share your thoughts, and help us craft the most captivating puzzle box adventure in XR!  

[media]
